Html:
Hi,

this is really a great piece of work, congratulations and thanks for sharing!

Are you planning to add slider controls for numeric/date facets, to allow users to define the filter ranges rather than just selecting between all the current values?

Thanks!

Hi,

I've recently added sliders to Numeric facets so they work exactly the same as the Sliverlight version - this is in the latest version of the control. Implementing Date facets is still on my to-do list.

I'm glad you've found the control useful - If you've built a collection I would be keen to have a look and add it to the collection showcase.

Roger
